attributes.action: CHANGE THE LAW SO ABSENT PARENTS HAVE TO PAY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THIS IS FOR PARENTS WHO HAVE TO BRING UP THEIR CHILDREN BY THEMSELVES AND NEED FINANTIAL HELP 
ALSO PARENTS SHOULD NOT BE ALLOWED TO WALK AWAY WITHOUT CONTRIBUTING

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
